Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a client for interacting with Quqi.com's API to perform daily tasks, manage group operations, and track rewards.

Class Description: The QuqiClient class provides methods to interact with Quqi.com's web services including task management, group operations, file uploads, and reward collection. It handles HTTP requests using Axios with proper headers and error handling.

Attributes:
- headers: [Object] - Contains HTTP headers including cookies and referer for API authentication
- config: [Object] - Configuration object containing user credentials and settings

Methods:
- constructor(config) -> [void] - Initializes the client with configuration including authentication cookies
- _sleep(ms) -> [Promise] - Utility method for delaying execution
- getDailyTask() -> [Promise<Array|null>] - Retrieves list of incomplete daily tasks
- getReward(id) -> [Promise<void>] - Claims reward for a specific task ID
- visit(id) -> [Promise<void>] - Visits a specified group to complete visit tasks
- getQuqiId() -> [Promise<Object|null>] - Gets group information and handles group joining if needed
- uploadImg(id) -> [Promise<void>] - Uploads and deletes a dummy image to complete upload tasks
- executeTasks() -> [Promise<String>] - Executes all available tasks and returns wallet information
